tags: like hello!!!! voldemort kills him in that forest
anyway this is just something neat i picked up/never noticed before
summary: so i'm reading the philosopher's stone again and i just noticed something that i'm not sure i've ever realised before. when...
body: so i’m reading the philosopher’s stone again and i just noticed something that i’m not sure i’ve ever realised before. when harry firsts sees quirell/voldemort in the forest drinking unicorn blood and he’s saved by firenze, bane loses it and says “have we not read what is to come in the movement of the planets” and like that is some hella good foreshadowing right there

reblog.comment: so i’m reading the philosopher’s stone again and i just noticed something that i’m not sure i’ve ever realised before. when harry firsts sees quirell/voldemort in the forest drinking unicorn blood and he’s saved by firenze, bane loses it and says “have we not read what is to come in the movement of the planets” and like that is some hella good foreshadowing right there

summary:
Gryffindors: do it because it's brave.
Ravenclaws: do it because it's wise.
Hufflepuff: do it because it's kind.
Slytherin: do...
body:
Gryffindors: do it because it’s brave.

Ravenclaws: do it because it’s wise.

Hufflepuff: do it because it’s kind.

Slytherin: do it for the VINE.

summary:
I’ve being tagged by @lupinscorner 
So let’s play
Rules: Answer the 21 questions and then tag 21 people you want to get to know...
body:
I’ve being tagged by @lupinscorner

So let’s play

Rules: Answer the 21 questions and then tag 21 people you want to get to know better

Nickname: I don’t know… Lau? I mean my name is Laura so everybody call me Lau

Height: 5’2”

Last movie I saw: “The Ridiculous 6”, bad film but you laugh a lot (we watched it for my father and he just slept in the end)

Last thing I googled: “how much is 1,57m in feet?” Sorry I use the decimal system

Favorite Musician: QUEEN!

Song stuck in my head: soundtrack of Rick and Morty

Other blogs: @thestartothemoon there I’m starting in the Hp rp community

Do I get ask?: yeah a few of them and when I get one, that make so happy, so thank you to everybody that send me asks!!

Following: 48 blogs, I follow mostly hp rp and fan arts accounts

Amount of sleep: I use to go to the bed at 23:00 but I don’t try to sleep till 00:30

Lucky numbers: I don’t have, just I don’t believe in luck

What I’m wearing: one of my favorites pijamas of Harry Potter

Dream job: I just wanna be illustrator and be able to go with my dog to work

Dream trip: Scotland (with a bit of lucky (I’m the worst but that is a way to talk) I’ll go this summer)

Play an instrument: People give me thanks cause a don’t play anything… I the worst in that

Favorite song: there are a lot… I can’t choose one

Random fact: I hate the feet with all my heart… ones I started to cry so bad when my ex tried to touch them

Describe your self in aesthetics things: (I’m bad at this things and you can “watch” me in my other account so…) a big cup of hot coffee, a tiny old bookstore, a comfortable sofa with a blanket, differents cameras of photos, a beats golden headphones, lot of draws onto wood floor…

Tagging: @eirienshaman @kapitan5o @askdeantheslytherpuff @siriusfirstchocolatesecond @rboz @space-marauder @metamorph-magus @modern-wolfstar @themischiefmanagers @yumenouveau @alessiajontrunfio @art-of-ame @gryffindorkus @lumosinlove @cris-art @masksofmickey @sirussly @asktheboywholived @snufflesshipsjily @hufflepuffs-pride @incorrectwolfstarquotes

summary:
Sirius: honey...
Remus: oh what is it now?
Sirius: can we have cake for dinner?
Remus: YES sur- wait what do you actually...
body:
Sirius: honey…

Remus: oh what is it now?

Sirius: can we have cake for dinner?

Remus: YES sur- wait what do you actually want?

Sirius: I found a pony and I am not giving it back.

blog.name: mymindsmadness
blog.title: My Mind's Madness
blog.description: 29 (until further notice) ⇾ Female ⇾ Pan but happily (monogamously) married ⇾ RL Pansy Parkinson. Don't @ Me.

summary: What sort of place would Hogwarts be if Harry Potter had never had to fight Lord Voldemort? Or better yet - what if Harry Potter...
caption:
What sort of place would Hogwarts be if Harry Potter had never had to fight Lord Voldemort? Or better yet - what if Harry Potter never existed? Wizarding Realm is a present day, alternate universe roleplaying site that takes place within that same wizarding world, yet without any of the history or legend of the Boy Who Lived. We promote a chill environment where we understand people have jobs and school to worry about, so we have no activity checks and lax face claim requirements to make sure everyone can comfortably write as a hobby. Open to all levels of writers, Wizarding Realm allows you to throw yourself headfirst into that magical world - everything from classes to Quidditch to getting in trouble with your house prefect! Ultimately it’s all in your control. You decide what sort of wizard or witch you want your character to be.

Jump into the world of WURR today!
